headline: Datadog (NasdaqGS:DDOG) Stock Dips 10% After Q4 Revenue Reaches US$738 Million
summary: Datadog (NasdaqGS:DDOG) recently reported its Q4 FY 2024 earnings, showcasing revenue growth to $737.73 million, though net income declined to $45.59 million, with diluted EPS decreasing to $0.13. Despite a positive annual revenue trend, this period saw the stock tumble 10.18%, coinciding with volatile market conditions influenced by recent geopolitical tensions, particularly the Trump administration's increased tariffs on Canadian imports. This decision drove broader market declines, with...
